articles.title: Maks Chmerkovskiy Says Taylor Swift Dancer Jan Ravnik Has 'No Business' Being a Pro on “DWTS:” 'Absurd' - Yahoo News Canada
articles.description: Maks Chmerkovskiy did not hold back during an appearance on his wife's podcast review of a recent 'Dancing with the Stars' episode, as he called first-time pro Jan Ravnik's casting 'absurd' and said Ravnik has no 'technique, quality,' or 'understanding of the…
articles.content:
• Maks Chmerkovskiy slammed Jan Ravnik's casting as a pro on Dancing with the Stars this season as "absurd"
  • Chmerkovskiy joined his wife, Peta Murgatroyd, on her podcast, where he said … [+2962 chars]
